"A.P.238/4/9/13:10": "...Phew-ee! That was a pretty amazing surprise! What a scary exhibition match!"
"I thought I was going to die... Claris Claes of the Council of Six. I heard the rumours, but she's something else..."
"It was like she was lightyears above us. Wow, what an awesome experience! The Techniques of the Council of Six, just amazing!"
"Was there something about that weapon she had? Clarissa, wasn't it."
"Every member of the Council of Six has a one-of-a-kind weapon."
"Maybe someone made a replica of it?"
"Or maybe the one Claris Claes has is a fake."
"...Well, if we start thinking up possibilities we'll be here all day."
"That said, we'll definitely check it out. Because we're..."
"The rumored Information Sisters, Patty and Tea."
